content.text: Hi, I'm a police officer. My family is proud of my decision to become one. I like to try new restaurants. My favorite place to eat recently is this new sushi place that just opened up. I drive a Subaru Outback because it's a practical car for getting to the lake and for carrying all my books.

Hello! I'm single because my time is devoted to rescuing animals. My cape is in storage and I am trying to adjust to Swedish life. My favorite author is Jane Austen. I love my parents very much. I am a couch potato.
That's awesome! I love Jane Austen. She's one of my favorite authors too. Did you grow up in Sweden?
I grew up in the United States. I moved to Sweden three years ago.
What made you move to Sweden?
I wanted to be closer to my family.
That's great! I'm glad you're enjoying it there.
I am! It's a beautiful country.
I'm sure it is. I've never been there, but I've heard great things.
